## A dissertation is an extraordinary amount of work.  Congratulations to each of these individuals who defended.

Since 2015, all SPU dissertations from Clinical and Industrial/Organizational Psychology are available in [full-text](https://digitalcommons.spu.edu/etd/) in our institution's Digital Commons.
